analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x2fa32a39fc1c399e0cc7b2935868f5165de7ce97.sol:
	Contract PayFairToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x2fa32a39fc1c399e0cc7b2935868f5165de7ce97.sol#152-153)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

PayFairToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x2fa32a39fc1c399e0cc7b2935868f5165de7ce97.sol#85-86)
PayFairToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0x2fa32a39fc1c399e0cc7b2935868f5165de7ce97.sol#86-87)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/2/0x2fa32a39fc1c399e0cc7b2935868f5165de7ce97.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/2/0x2fa32a39fc1c399e0cc7b2935868f5165de7ce97.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of PayFairToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x2fa32a39fc1c399e0cc7b2935868f5165de7ce97.sol#214) is not in mixedCase
